attributes.action: support euthanasia by making yourself the first candidate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it will be imposible for Gordon Brown to live with the ridicual of his abject failure as a prime minister. for all his so called intelligence the man has proved to be an empty vessel but making little noise. it time to go and you should go ino the real world and get a job for the first time. learn to drive a car would be something else you could do.
